title: Football Comes Home
description:
The FC crew react to England's historic victory over Germany as the Lionesses won their first major trophy in front of their home crowd. Plus, Gab Marcotti and Frank Leboeuf join the show to break down Cristiano Ronaldo leaving Manchester United's friendly before the final whistle and analyze PSG's first victory of the season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: England make history in first EURO championship; Ronaldo leaves Manchester United friendly early; PSG win their first silverware of the season
